name: Riviera Baby Crib
description: The Riviera baby crib by Kifu Paris is the ultimate luxury piece for your child's bedroom. Inspired by the birth of her first child, Kifu Augousti designed this piece to embrace the whimsical world of a child. The piece is inlaid in cream shagreen with bronze-patina brass details. The mattress is included with the piece and includes a large drawer at the bottom for practical use. The circles are made of rose quartz. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks Design SKU Reference KCRB02. All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
